name: Cricetus Apparatus
description:
Mine cryptocurency using your pet hamsters as source of power! Look how happy they are!

More hamsters = more power. More power = more GPUs. More GPUs = faster mining.

  • Click on the compter screen to access store and get upgrades
  • Click on the computer to check your GPUs
  • Click on the table to manage hamsters
  • PROTIP: Use right click on hamster

Upgrade your hamsters and your rig to mine coins faster!
